title: Week 14 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 12/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 14 gambling advice, covering all 15 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Ravens-Bills, Chiefs-Patriots, Panthers-Falcons, Seahawks-Rams, Giants-Eagles, Titans-Raiders, Steelers-Cardinals, Dolphins-Jets, 49ers-Saints, Chargers-Jaguars, Colts-Bucs, Bengals-Browns, Lions-Vikings, Redskins-Packers and Broncos-Texans. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
